69struct Slot
70{
71 enum
72 {
73 SlotType_Octa,
74 SlotType_Material,
75 SlotType_Decal
76 };
77
78 struct Tex
79 {
80 int type;
81 Texture *t;
82 string name;
83 int combined;
84
85 Tex() : t(nullptr), combined(-1) {}
86 };
87
88 int index, smooth;
89 vector<Tex> sts;
90 Shader *shader;
91 vector<SlotShaderParam> params;
92 VSlot *variants;
93 bool loaded;
94 uint texmask;
95 char *grass;
96 Texture *grasstex, *thumbnail;
97
98 Slot(int index = -1) : index(index), variants(nullptr), grass(nullptr) { reset(); }
99 virtual ~Slot() {}
100
101 virtual int type() const
102 {
103 return SlotType_Octa;
104 }
105
106 virtual const char *name() const;
107 virtual const char *texturedir() const
108 {
109 return "media/texture";
110 }
111
112 virtual VSlot &emptyvslot();
113
114 virtual int cancombine(int type)const;
115 virtual bool shouldpremul(int) const
116 {
117 return false;
118 }
119
131 int findtextype(int type, int last = -1) const;
132
133 void load(int index, Slot::Tex &t);
134 void load();
135
144 Texture *loadthumbnail();
145
146 void reset()
147 {
148 smooth = -1;
149 sts.setsize(0);
150 shader = nullptr;
151 params.setsize(0);
152 loaded = false;
153 texmask = 0;
154 delete[] grass;
155 grass = nullptr;
156 grasstex = nullptr;
157 thumbnail = nullptr;
158 }
159
160 void cleanup()
161 {
162 loaded = false;
163 grasstex = nullptr;
164 thumbnail = nullptr;
165 for(int i = 0; i < sts.length(); i++)
166 {
167 Tex &t = sts[i];
168 t.t = nullptr;
169 t.combined = -1;
170 }
171 }
172};
173
186struct VSlot
187{
188 Slot *slot;
189 VSlot *next;
190 int index, changed;
191 vector<SlotShaderParam> params;
192 bool linked;
193 float scale;
194 int rotation;
195 vec angle;
196 ivec2 offset;
197 vec2 scroll;
198 int layer;
199 float alphafront, alphaback;
200 vec colorscale;
201 vec glowcolor;
202 float refractscale;
203 vec refractcolor;
204
205 VSlot(Slot *slot = nullptr, int index = -1) : slot(slot), next(nullptr), index(index), changed(0)
206 {
207 reset();
208 if(slot)
209 {
210 addvariant(slot);
211 }
212 }
213
214 void addvariant(Slot *slot);
215
216 void reset()
217 {
218 params.setsize(0);
219 linked = false;
220 scale = 1;
221 rotation = 0;
222 angle = vec(0, sinf(0), cosf(0));
223 offset = ivec2(0, 0);
224 scroll = vec2(0, 0);
225 layer = 0;
226 alphafront = 0.5f;
227 alphaback = 0;
228 colorscale = vec(1, 1, 1);
229 glowcolor = vec(1, 1, 1);
230 refractscale = 0;
231 refractcolor = vec(1, 1, 1);
232 }
233
234 void cleanup()
235 {
236 linked = false;
237 }
238
239 bool isdynamic() const;
240};
241
245struct DecalSlot : Slot, VSlot
246{
247 float depth, fade;
248
249 DecalSlot(int index = -1) : Slot(index), VSlot(this), depth(1), fade(0.5f) {}
250
251 int type() const
252 {
253 return SlotType_Decal;
254 }
255
256 const char *name() const;
257 const char *texturedir() const
258 {
259 return "media/decal";
260 }
261
262 VSlot &emptyvslot()
263 {
264 return *this;
265 }
266
267 int cancombine(int type) const;
268 bool shouldpremul(int type) const;
269
270 void reset()
271 {
272 Slot::reset();
273 VSlot::reset();
274 depth = 1;
275 fade = 0.5f;
276 }
277
278 void cleanup()
279 {
280 Slot::cleanup();
281 VSlot::cleanup();
282 }
283};

290 vslotmap() {}
291 vslotmap(int index, VSlot *vslot) : index(index), vslot(vslot) {}
292};
